definitions.text: a phrase that can function as the subject or object of a verb
relating to or constituting or bearing or giving a name
examples: the Russian system of nominal brevity
taxable males as revealed by the nominal rolls

definitions.text: insignificantly small; a matter of form only (`tokenish' is informal)
pertaining to a noun or to a word group that functions as a noun
of, relating to, or characteristic of an amount that is not adjusted for inflation
named; bearing the name of a specific person

examples: the nominal (or titular) head of his party
